title: Hint
text: Consider the distribution of forces between the car, boat, and trailer. Apply Newton's third law and the given percentage to find the force in the hitch.

title: Steps
text: Step 1: Apply Newton's third law to find the force in the hitch between the car and the trailer. Step 2: Use the given percentage to calculate the force based on the total resisting forces experienced by the boat and trailer. Step 3: Clearly show all calculations and units.
